alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 2:26PM PST until January 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches above 3500 feet with 2 to 3 feet over the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County County. * WHEN...Through 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be 4000 to 5500 feet this afternoon, but will rise to over 6000 feet tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
